monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Activates ice orbs - Activates earth orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster gets a Charge stack, share it with another Monster in your party.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Unique Aura: Bleed stacks on enemies are not removed when they take Bleed damage.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Bleed Out
skills.description: Unique Aura: Bleed stacks on enemies are not removed when they take Bleed damage.

skills.name: Bounty
skills.description: This Monster gets 2 random Buffs when an enemy Monster is knocked out.

skills.name: Cleansing Flame
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (fire) Removes 1 Buff from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (fire) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (fire) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) magical damage (fire) Removes 3 Buffs from target

skills.name: Concealed
skills.description: During its first round, this Monster has an additional 25% chance to dodge enemy hits.

skills.name: Counterfeit
skills.description: Uses the last action used by target enemy.

skills.name: Crit Chance Focus
skills.description: Critical Chance values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Edge
skills.description: Each Critical Hit grants this Monster a Charge stack.

skills.name: Critical Hex
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies a random Debuff.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Dark Shroud
skills.description: 8 x 75% (600%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Tether and Blind.

skills.name: Deep Wounds
skills.description: Aura: Bleed damage on enemies is increased by 40%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Double Strike
skills.description: On each hit, there's a 10% chance to trigger another hit with the same base damage. (Cannot trigger again on Double Strike hits)

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Critical Chance also increases the chance to dodge enemy hits by 20% of the value.

skills.name: Fiery Stabs
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fire Pillar
skills.description: 3 x 200% (600%) magical damage (fire) applies Sorcery, Regeneration & Spellshield (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Freeze
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Frost Pierce
skills.description: 8 x 65% (520%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +75% every hit has a 15% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Ice Spears
skills.description: 3 x 90% (270%) physical damage (water) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spears Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) physical damage (water) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spears Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (water) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Killing Dance
skills.description: Whenever this Monster knocks an enemy out, it gains 3 Charge stacks and it regains half of the Charge stacks it used up during the attack.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gets a Charge stack, share it with another Monster in your party.

skills.name: Lifesteal
skills.description: Heal by 15% of the damage dealt to enemies.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magical Weakness
skills.description: Magical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Eater
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Poison Eater Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Sticky Impact
skills.description: Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a stack of Tether. (Stacks don't count as Debuffs)

skills.name: Sticky Web
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Tether.

skills.name: Sticky Web Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies 2 stacks of Tether.

skills.name: Toxin
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Variety
skills.description: Every attack deals 15% increased damage when used for the first time during combat. (Different levels count as same attack)

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Clear Stone
drops.description: Transforms a shifted monster to neutral form.
